name: garlic
description: Garlic is a pungent, flavorful bulb used in a variety of dishes for its distinctive taste and aroma. It is often minced or crushed and added to sauces, marinades, and dressings.

name: fresh tomato
description: Tomato is a versatile, juicy fruit that is commonly used in salads, sauces, and soups. It is rich in vitamins and antioxidants, and can be eaten raw or cooked.

name: olive oil
description: Olive oil is a healthy, flavorful oil extracted from olives. It is widely used in cooking, dressings, and marinades, and is known for its heart-healthy benefits and rich, fruity taste.

name: butter
description: Butter is a rich, creamy dairy product made from churning milk or cream. It is commonly used in baking, cooking, and as a spread.

name: yellow onion
description: Yellow onion is a versatile vegetable with a strong flavor. It is commonly used in soups, stews, and sautés.

name: white onion
description: White onion is a crisp, flavorful vegetable often used in salads, salsas, and as a topping for various dishes.

name: broccoli
description: Broccoli is a nutritious green vegetable rich in vitamins and minerals. It is commonly steamed, roasted, or added to stir-fries.

name: carrot
description: Carrot is a crunchy, sweet root vegetable that is rich in beta-carotene. It is often eaten raw, steamed, or added to soups and stews.

name: all purpose flour
description: All purpose flour is a versatile flour used in baking and cooking. It is made from a blend of hard and soft wheat.

name: chicken stock
description: Chicken stock is a flavorful liquid made by simmering chicken bones and vegetables. It is commonly used as a base for soups and sauces.

name: beef stock
description: Beef stock is a rich, savory liquid made by simmering beef bones and vegetables. It is often used as a base for soups, stews, and sauces.

name: vegetable stock
description: Vegetable stock is a flavorful liquid made by simmering a variety of vegetables. It is commonly used as a base for soups and stews.

name: half & half
description: Half & half is a dairy product made from equal parts milk and cream. It is often used in coffee, sauces, and soups.

name: paprika
description: Paprika is a ground spice made from dried red peppers. It adds a mild, sweet flavor and vibrant color to dishes.

name: cayenne pepper
description: Cayenne pepper is a hot, spicy powder made from dried chili peppers. It is used to add heat and flavor to a variety of dishes.

name: cheddar cheese
description: Cheddar cheese is a popular, sharp-tasting cheese made from cow's milk. It is commonly used in sandwiches, sauces, and as a topping for various dishes.

name: salt
description: Salt is a mineral used to enhance the flavor of food. It is a common seasoning in cooking and baking.

name: pepper
description: Pepper is a spice made from ground peppercorns. It adds a pungent, spicy flavor to dishes and is commonly used as a seasoning.

name: garlic powder
description: Garlic powder is a ground form of dehydrated garlic. It is used as a seasoning to add garlic flavor to dishes.

name: onion powder
description: Onion powder is a ground form of dehydrated onions. It is used as a seasoning to add onion flavor to dishes.

name: cumin
description: Cumin is a spice made from the dried seeds of the cumin plant. It has a warm, earthy flavor and is commonly used in Middle Eastern, Indian, and Mexican cuisines.

name: oregano
description: Oregano is a fragrant herb commonly used in Mediterranean and Mexican cuisines. It has a slightly bitter, pungent flavor.

name: thyme
description: Thyme is a fragrant herb with a slightly minty flavor. It is commonly used in soups, stews, and roasted dishes.

name: scallion
description: Scallion, also known as green onion, is a mild-flavored vegetable used in salads, soups, and as a garnish.

name: iceberg lettuce
description: Iceberg lettuce is a crisp, refreshing vegetable commonly used in salads and sandwiches. It has a mild flavor and crunchy texture.

name: romaine lettuce
description: Romaine lettuce is a leafy green vegetable with a slightly bitter taste. It is commonly used in salads, especially Caesar salads.

name: parsley
description: Parsley is a bright green herb used as a garnish and flavoring in a variety of dishes. It has a fresh, slightly peppery taste.

name: green pepper
description: Green pepper, also known as bell pepper, is a crisp, sweet vegetable commonly used in salads, stir-fries, and as a topping for pizzas.

name: jalapeno
description: Jalapeno is a medium-sized chili pepper with a moderate level of heat. It is commonly used in Mexican cuisine to add spice to dishes.

name: chicken breast
description: Chicken breast is a lean cut of meat from the breast of a chicken. It is commonly grilled, baked, or sautéed.

name: shrimp
description: Shrimp are small, flavorful crustaceans that are commonly used in seafood dishes. They can be boiled, grilled, or sautéed.

name: ground beef
description: Ground beef is minced beef that is commonly used in a variety of dishes, including burgers, meatballs, and tacos.

name: soy sauce
description: Soy sauce is a salty, savory sauce made from fermented soybeans. It is commonly used in Asian cuisine as a seasoning and condiment.

name: crushed tomatoes
description: Crushed tomatoes are tomatoes that have been peeled, seeded, and crushed. They are commonly used in sauces, soups, and stews for their rich flavor and thick texture.

name: white rice
description: White rice is a staple grain that is widely consumed around the world. It is commonly boiled or steamed and served as a side dish or base for various recipes.

name: chili powder
description: Chili powder is a blend of ground dried chili peppers and other spices. It is commonly used to add heat and flavor to dishes, especially in Mexican and Tex-Mex cuisine.

name: rotisserie chicken
description: Rotisserie chicken is a whole chicken that has been seasoned and cooked on a rotisserie. It is commonly used in salads, sandwiches, and as a main dish.

name: egg noodles
description: Egg noodles are a type of pasta made with flour and eggs. They are commonly used in soups, casseroles, and as a side dish.
